info.title: SEKOIA.IO Asset management API
info.description: Enumerate, manage, recognize and enrich your computers, networks, users and their behavioral activity

get.description: Search assets, returning a paginated, sorted, filtered list

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Limit a number of items (allowed range is 1-100), default is 20.
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Limit a number of items (allowed range is 1-100), default is 20.

parameters.name: offset

schema.description: A number of items to skip, default is 0.
schema.title: Offset

parameters.description: A number of items to skip, default is 0.

parameters.name: also_search_in_detection_properties

schema.description: Search by attached detection property too
schema.title: Also Search In Detection Properties

parameters.description: Search by attached detection property too

parameters.name: uuids

schema.description: Filter by comma-separated list of asset UUIDs
schema.title: Uuids

parameters.description: Filter by comma-separated list of asset UUIDs

parameters.name: community_uuids

schema.description: Filter by comma-separated list of community UUIDs
schema.title: Community Uuids

parameters.description: Filter by comma-separated list of community UUIDs

parameters.name: type

schema.description: Filter by comma-separated list of asset types
schema.title: Type

parameters.description: Filter by comma-separated list of asset types

parameters.name: category

schema.description: Filter by comma-separated list of asset categories
schema.title: Category

parameters.description: Filter by comma-separated list of asset categories

parameters.name: source

schema.description: Filter by comma-separated list of asset sources
schema.title: Source

parameters.description: Filter by comma-separated list of asset sources

parameters.name: with_telemetry

schema.description: Enrich returned assets with their telemetry statistics
schema.title: With Telemetry

parameters.description: Enrich returned assets with their telemetry statistics

parameters.name: incorporate_atoms

schema.description: Enrich returned assets with their detection properties
schema.title: Incorporate Atoms

parameters.description: Enrich returned assets with their detection properties

parameters.name: include_revoked

schema.description: Include revoked assets in the search results
schema.title: Include Revoked

parameters.description: Include revoked assets in the search results

parameters.name: rule_uuid

schema.description: Filter by comma-separated list of asset discovery rules UUIDs
schema.title: Rule Uuid

parameters.description: Filter by comma-separated list of asset discovery rules UUIDs

parameters.name: rule_version

schema.description: Filter by comma-separated list of asset discovery rules versions
schema.title: Rule Version

parameters.description: Filter by comma-separated list of asset discovery rules versions

parameters.name: format

schema.description: Format return assets using legacy Assets API v1.0 format
schema.title: Format

parameters.description: Format return assets using legacy Assets API v1.0 format

get.description: Get an asset by its UUID
Get an asset's timeline by its UUID

post.description:
Merge a list of source assets into a destination asset,
    by attaching all source detection/contextual properties to the destination asset
    before revoking the source assets
Attach a single detection property to an asset

schema.title: Response Attach Detection Property V2 Asset Management Assets  Uuid  Attach Post

post.description: Detach a single detection property from an asset

schema.title: Response Detach Detection Property V2 Asset Management Assets  Uuid  Detach Post

post.description: Add an arbitrary tag to an asset

schema.title: Response Add Asset Tag V2 Asset Management Assets  Uuid  Tag  Tag  Post

delete.description: Remove a tag from an asset

schema.title: Response Remove Asset Tag V2 Asset Management Assets  Uuid  Tag  Tag  Delete

get.description: Get an asset's given contextual property

schema.title: Response Get Asset Contextual Property V2 Asset Management Assets  Uuid  Prop  Prop  Get

post.description: Set an asset's given contextual property

schema.title: Response Set Asset Contextual Property V2 Asset Management Assets  Uuid  Prop  Prop  Post

delete.description: Remove a contextual property from an asset

schema.title: Response Remove Asset Contextual Property V2 Asset Management Assets  Uuid  Prop  Prop  Delete

post.description: Add a recommendation to an asset

schema.title: Response Add Asset Recommendation V2 Asset Management Assets  Uuid  Recommendation Post
Response Update Asset Recommendation V2 Asset Management Assets  Uuid  Recommendation  Recommendation Uuid  Put
Response Remove Asset Recommendation V2 Asset Management Assets  Uuid  Recommendation  Recommendation Uuid  Delete

delete.description: Remove multiple recommendations from an asset

parameters.name: recommendation_uuids

schema.description: list of recommendations UUID to remove
schema.title: Recommendation Uuids

parameters.description: list of recommendations UUID to remove

schema.title: Response Remove Asset Recommendations V2 Asset Management Assets  Uuid  Recommendations Delete

get.description: Search atoms, returning a paginated, sorted, filtered list

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Limit a number of items (allowed range is 1-100), default is 20.
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Limit a number of items (allowed range is 1-100), default is 20.

parameters.name: offset

schema.description: A number of items to skip, default is 0.
schema.title: Offset

parameters.description: A number of items to skip, default is 0.

parameters.name: community_uuids

schema.description: Filter by comma-separated list of community UUIDs
schema.title: Community Uuids

parameters.description: Filter by comma-separated list of community UUIDs

parameters.name: type

schema.description: Filter by comma-separated list of atom types
schema.title: Type

parameters.description: Filter by comma-separated list of atom types

parameters.name: with_telemetry

schema.description: Include atoms telemetry statistics in the response
schema.title: With Telemetry

parameters.description: Include atoms telemetry statistics in the response

criticity.title: Criticity
criticity.description: Asset criticality (legacy compatibility with API v1.0)

asset_type.title: Asset Type
asset_type.description: Asset type (legacy compatibility with API v1.0)

event_uuid.title: Event Uuid
event_uuid.description: UUID of the event that generated the timeline entry

rule_uuid.title: Rule Uuid
rule_uuid.description: UUID of the asset discovery rule that triggered the timeline entry

rule_version.title: Rule Version
rule_version.description: Version of the asset discovery rule that triggered the timeline entry

criticity.title: Criticity
criticity.description: Asset criticality (legacy compatibility with API v1.0)

asset_type.title: Asset Type
asset_type.description: Asset type (legacy compatibility with API v1.0)

destination.title: Destination
destination.description: UUID of the asset that will receive all source assets' properties

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: A list of asset UUIDs whose properties will be merged into the destination asset
